page.title: 20Snippets
page.content:
The Rector of Walgrave serves 3 parishes, Walgrave, Old and Hannington. The Baptist Minister comes from Moulton.
In Walgrave there are the remains of a fortified manor house with its moat. There are also some medieval fish ponds.
When doing the questionnaire, we saw the rector gardening in his dog collar and wellington boots. Two girls were nearly bitten by a dog.
The information was collected by all the Juniors in the school. The top junior class did all the typing. We all found it hard work but very interesting.
